lines.text: Y'know... maybe he was targeting the other wizard!
Nah- the spell backfires if the target has a <c=#FF00FF>status condition,</c> but I don't think being a wizard counts.
Maybe... bleeding? Or... the charred robes?
Actually... the robes could be it. If his robes caught on fire at some point, well... it's obvious right?
That could count as being ''On Fire'', and that's gotta be a status effect.
...I should probably focus on the <c=#FF00FF>other victim,</c> though.
